page.title: 19CLASS 2/2
page.content: Here are some interesting statistics about the Humanities class which I belong to. 53% of this mixed class are boys. The average age is 13 years 4 months. Most members of the class,41%, were born in Hertford; 49% within 50 miles of Hertford; 3% elsewhere in Britain & 7% abroad. 28% of the pupils' parents are divorced or separated. 3% of class members are the only child in their family; 50% are one of two children; 31% are one of three and 16% are one of four children in their family. Most parents, 66%, own the houses in which they live,, but some rent from the Council, 32%. 2% have houses which come with their father's job. ____ continued on page 20____
